title: The Sweet - First Recordings 1968-1971 and more.. [FLAC]
description:
Short:

British band "The Sweet" (also Sweet) was formed in early 1968 under the former name "Sweetshop". 
He founded by vocalist Brian Connolly, drummer Mick Tucker, bassist Steve Priest and guitarist Frank Torpey.

First Recordings 1968-1971:

01."The Lollipop Man" (A. Hammond/M. Hazlewood)
02."Time" (Scott/Tucker/Priest/Connolly)
03."All You'll Ever Get From Me" (Cook/Greenway)
04."The Juicer" (Mick Stewart)
05."Get On The Line" (Barry/Kim)
06."Mr. McGallagher" (Mick Stewart)
07."Slow Motion" (Wainman/Spirio)
08."It's Lonely Out There" (Siegel/Jay)
09."Questions" (Gillan/David)
10."I'm On My Way" (Travajoli/Mellin)
11."The Spider" (Sala/Abry/Zahedan)
12."My Little Girl From Kentucky" (Sala/Abry/Vaughn)

Desolation Boulevard (U.S. version):

01."Ballroom Blitz" (Chapman/Chinn)
02."The 6-Teens" (Chapman/Chinn)
03."No You Don't" (Chapman/Chinn)
04."A.C.D.C." (Chapman/Chinn)
05."I Wanna Be Committed" (Chapman/Chinn)
06."Sweet F.A." (Scott/Tucker/Connolly/Priest)
07."Fox on the Run" (Scott/Tucker/Connolly/Priest) (7" version)
08."Set Me Free" (Scott)
09."Into the Night" (Scott)
10."Solid Gold Brass" (Brian Connolly; Steve Priest; Mick Tucker; Andy Scott) with guitar overdub
